tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE treatment_methods (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  treatment_type VARCHAR(50),
  treatment_duration INT,
  success_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    treatment_method VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE treatments (
    treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    treatment_name VARCHAR(50),
    success_rate FLOAT,
    cost DECIMAL(10,2),
    side_effects VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE PatientTreatments (
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_id INT,
  treatment_date DATE,
  outcome VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (treatment_id) REFERENCES Treatments(treatment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PatientTreatmentHistory (
	patient_id INT,
	treatment_id INT,
	date_given DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (treatment_id) REFERENCES Treatments(treatment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  treatment_method VARCHAR(50),
  treatment_start_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE treatments (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  treatment_name VARCHAR(50),
  treatment_description TEXT,
  effectiveness_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE doctors (
  doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50),
  specialty VARCHAR(50),
  hospital VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE patient_medical_history (
  patient_id INT,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  treatment_id INT,
  treatment_start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (treatment_id) REFERENCES treatments(treatment_id)
)

CREATE TABLE treatment_outcomes (
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_id INT,
  outcome_description TEXT,
  outcome_date DATE,
  effectiveness_rating INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (treatment_id) REFERENCES treatments(treatment_id)
)
